1.0.name: wordpress/wayn-countries-visited-widget
1.0.description: WhereAreYouNow.com or WAYN.com is a great website that allows you to track your travels and meet like minded people. The WAYN Countries Visited Widget was created so that travelers with wordpress blogs can display their visited countries right in their sidebar.
